title: She-Hulk Episode 4 Spoiler Talk - Kinda Funny Screencast
description:
Go to http://expressvpn.com/KINDAFUNNY to get an extra 3 months free.

Tim, Andy, Joey, and Greg review and breakdown their theories on the latest Disney Plus MCU Marvel Studios show She-Hulk Attorney At Law starring Tatiana Maslany and Mark Ruffalo.
